description: Investigators suspect the 45-year-old sergeant major of links to the far right.
title: Germany far right: Explosives found at elite soldier's home
title_page: Germany far right: Explosives found at elite soldier's home - BBC News
maintext: The man arrested on Wednesday has also been under investigation since 2017 and he is suspected of arms violations. "So far, ammunition, explosives and weapons have been made safe. The soldier involved has been arrested and is currently being questioned by the authorities concerned," said defence officials.
